The '[[Los Angeles Dodgers]] {{By|2012}} season' was the 123rd for the franchise
in Major League Baseball, and their 55th season in Los Angeles. The Dodgers
celebrated the Golden Anniversary of Dodger Stadium, their home since .
categories: 2012 Major League Baseball season|Los Angeles Dodgers season
